name: Framer Filters
description: Apply 30+ beautiful image filters with live preview, adjustable sliders, and export functionality. Perfect for designers who want professional image effects without leaving Framer.
author: Bills Walls

components.name: FramerFilters
components.description: A comprehensive image filter toolkit with 30+ CSS-based filters, live preview, adjustable sliders, custom presets, and export functionality.

imageUrl.title: Image URL
imageUrl.description: URL of the image to apply filters to. Supports any image format (JPG, PNG, WebP, etc.)
